item.title:
RT by @EUDelegationUA: We must keep up strong pressure on Russia.
Good to see the 15th sanctions package agreed.
It will further weaken Putin's war machine.
item.dc:creator: @kajakallas
item.description:
We must keep up strong pressure on Russia.

Good to see the 15th sanctions package agreed.

It will further weaken Putin's war machine.

item.title:
RT by @EUDelegationUA: Important agreement reached today by EU ambassadors on the 15th package of sanctions against Russia containing measures to counter the shadow fleet.
We must keep up efforts to further limit Russia‚Äôs ability to wage war.
item.dc:creator: @eucopresident
item.description:
Important agreement reached today by EU ambassadors on the 15th package of sanctions against Russia containing measures to counter the shadow fleet.

We must keep up efforts to further limit Russia‚Äôs ability to wage war.

item.title:
RT by @EUDelegationUA: The EU and its G7 partners are committed to keeping a pressure on the Kremlin.
I welcome the agreement on our 15th package of sanctions, targeting in particular Russia‚Äôs shadow fleet.
item.dc:creator: @vonderleyen
item.description:
The EU and its G7 partners are committed to keeping a pressure on the Kremlin.

I welcome the agreement on our 15th package of sanctions, targeting in particular Russia‚Äôs shadow fleet.

nitter.privacydev.net/HU24EU/status/1866855441793245321#m

item.title:
RT by @EUDelegationUA: ‚ÄºÔ∏è Ambassadors have just agreed on the 15th package of sanctions in reaction to Russia's aggression against Ukraine.
üóíÔ∏è The package¬†adds more persons and entities to the already existing sanctions list, and targets entities in Russia and in third countries other than Russia that indirectly contribute to Russia‚Äôs military and technological enhancement through the circumvention of export restrictions.
üõ¢The adopted sanctions constrain the activity of additional vessels of third states operating to contribute or support actions or policies supporting Russia‚Äôs actions against Ukraine.
item.dc:creator: @HU24EU
item.description:
‚ÄºÔ∏è Ambassadors have just agreed on the 15th package of sanctions in reaction to Russia's aggression against Ukraine.

üóíÔ∏è The package¬†adds more persons and entities to the already existing sanctions list, and targets entities in Russia and in third countries other than Russia that indirectly contribute to Russia‚Äôs military and technological enhancement through the circumvention of export restrictions.

üõ¢The adopted sanctions constrain the activity of additional vessels of third states operating to contribute or support actions or policies supporting Russia‚Äôs actions against Ukraine.

item.title:
RT by @EUDelegationUA: Russia‚Äôs war on Ukraine and conflicts in the Middle East and Sudan devastate civilians‚Äô human rights, especially for women and children.
On #HumanRightsDay, the EU stands firm ‚Äî Your Rights, Your Future, Right Now and Always.
